# Weekly Checkpoints (High-Level)

| Week | Focus | Deliverables | Review |

| 1 | Node.js internals + Go setup | Go hello service + Node profiling notes | Self-review checklist |
| 2 | API design + data modeling | API error spec + normalized schema | Peer mock |
| 3 | Caching + consistency | Cache layer doc + idempotency strategy | Design review |
| 4 | Messaging fundamentals | Queue vs stream comparison + prototype | Mentor feedback |
| 5 | Event-driven patterns | Feature flag design doc (v1) | Trade-off matrix validation |
| 6 | Distributed transactions | Payment gateway design doc draft | Architecture walkthrough |
| 7 | Observability & SLOs | SLO + metrics mapping | SLO reasonableness check |
| 8 | Performance engineering | Latency budget + load baseline | Benchmark reproducibility |
| 9 | Project implementation | Core service endpoints + tests | Code quality audit |
|10 | Resilience & failure injection | Chaos test notes + retry tuning | Postmortem simulation |
|11 | System design drills | 6 mock scenarios + improvements | Score tracking |
